cells.data:
-- takeWhile :: (a -> Bool) -> [a] -> [a]
on takeWhile(p, xs)
    set bln to false
    tell mReturn(p)
        repeat with i from 1 to length of xs
            if not |Î»|(item i of xs) then
                set bln to true
                exit repeat
            end if
        end repeat
    end tell
    if bln then
        if i > 1 then
            items 1 thru (i - 1) of xs
        else
            {}
        end if
    else
        xs
    end if
end takeWhile
